A.—RELIGION.

II. BRAHMANISM.

This volume contains the following three pamphlets.

4—2 Translation of an abridgment of the Vedant or Resolution of all the Veds; by Rammohun Roy. Calcutta, 1816, 14 pag.—Translation of the Isho-panishad, one of the chapters of the Yagur Veda; by the same. Calcutta, 1816, xxiv-8 pag.—A defence of Hindoo Theism in reply to the attack of an advocate for idolatry at Madras by the same. Calcutta, 1817, 58 pag., small 4°.

Oxford, Or. trans. fund, 1837, 4°
